onboarding1.title: Надсилайте, отримуйте і керуйте IOTA токенами

legal.title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Service
legal.body: Будь ласка, ознайомтеся з Політикою конфіденційності та Умовами надання послуг.

legal.checkbox: I've read and I accept the Privacy Policy & Terms of Service

setup.title: Налаштування Вашого гаманця
setup.body1: You can create multiple user profiles to keep your tokens separate and improve privacy.
setup.body2: Наразі давайте почнемо з імені вашого профілю. Ви можете додати більше профілів пізніше.

secure.title: Secure your wallet
secure.body1: Save and print the Recovery Kit PDF template.
secure.body2: If you fill out the Recovery Kit and store it safely, you will always be able to recover your wallet.

password.title: Створіть пароль
password.body1: You need a strong password to protect your funds. Use a combination of words, and avoid common phrases, names or dates.
password.body2: It is recommended that you write down your password in your Recovery Kit.

protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.body1: Set up a login PIN to make sure that only you can enter your wallet.

pin.title: Встановіть PIN-код
pin.body1: Enter a 6-digit PIN below. You will be asked for your PIN to access your profile.

confirmPin.title: Підтвердіть свій PIN-код
confirmPin.body1: Your PIN keeps your balance and transactions private.
confirmPin.body2: Re-enter your PIN code to proceed.

backup.title: Створити резервну копію вашого гаманця
backup.body1: You will now be shown a recovery phrase. Write it down in your Recovery Kit.
backup.body2: Do not share your recovery phrase with anyone. It can be used to access your tokens from anywhere.
backup.body3: Якщо ви загубите фразу відновлення, ви можете втратити свої кошти.

recoveryPhrase.title: Фраза відновлення
recoveryPhrase.body1: In your Recovery Kit, write down the words in the exact order shown.
recoveryPhrase.body2: Keep this private and safely stored.
recoveryPhrase.body3: It is important to have a written backup. Computers often fail and files can corrupt.

verifyRecoveryPhrase.title: Перевірте фразу відновлення
verifyRecoveryPhrase.body: Let's check you wrote down the phrase correctly. Please select each word in numbered order.
verifyRecoveryPhrase.verifiedBody: Remember to keep it private and safely stored.

backupWallet.title: Зробити резервну копію Stronghold
backupWallet.body1: Enter your password to backup your wallet to a Stronghold file. Your password is used to encrypt the backup.
backupWallet.body2: Reasons why digital backups are important:
backupWallet.reason1: Easily recover your wallet without typing in your recovery phrase
backupWallet.reason2: Import your wallet to other devices

recoveryPhraseSaved.title: Резервне копіювання успішно виконано
recoveryPhraseSaved.body: Ви створили резервну копію гаманця для Stronghold.

congratulations.title: Wallet setup completed
congratulations.body: Your new wallet is ready to use.

import.title: Імпортувати гаманець
import.body: Якщо у вас є фраза для відновлення або резервна копія Stronghold, ви можете імпортувати її тут.

importFromText.title: Відновіть свій гаманець фразою відновлення або seed
importFromText.body1: A seed consists of 81 characters. This is used to recover from an older Trinity wallet.
importFromText.body2: A recovery phrase is 24 words long, all lower case, with spaces between. This is used to recover an existing Firefly wallet.
importFromText.body3: Введіть seed, або фразу для відновлення

importFromFile.title: Restore your wallet using a backup file
importFromFile.body: Імпортуйте файл резервної копії, щоб відновити гаманець. Резервні копії можуть бути Stronghold (.stronghold) або Trinity SeedVault (.kdbx).

importBackupPassword.title: Відновіть свій гаманець із SeedVault або Stronghold
importBackupPassword.body1: Будь ласка введіть пароль для захисту резервної копії.
importBackupPassword.body2: Це пароль, який ви встановили під час створення резервної копії.

importSuccess.title: Ви успішно відновили резервну копію
importSuccess.body: Тепер ви можете налаштувати свій новий гаманець.
importSuccess.seedvaultBody: Your password is correct, you can now continue.
importSuccess.strongholdBody: Your password is correct, you can now continue.

migrate.title: Перенести свої кошти
migrate.body1: Це автоматичний процес перенесення ваших коштів на новий гаманець. Ми перевіримо витрачені адреси, що послаблюють вашу безпеку.
migrate.body2: Це може зайняти деякий час. Не вимикайте пристрій під час міграції.

generalSettings.title: Загальні налаштування
generalSettings.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

security.title: Безпека
security.description: Change your password and adjust security-related settings

advancedSettings.title: Розширені налаштування
advancedSettings.description: Tools and manual settings for technical users

helpAndInfo.title: Допомога та інформація
helpAndInfo.description: Find the answer to a question or get help with an issue

profile.title: Профіль
profile.description: Change your profile name or set an avatar

currency.title: Валюта
currency.description: Adjusts balance conversion and updates chart options

exportStronghold.title: Export Backup
exportStronghold.description: Export to a Stronghold file - a complete encrypted backup of your wallet and latest transaction history.

appLock.title: Automatic Lock
appLock.description: Time elapsed before your wallet locks and logs you out

changePassword.title: Змінити пароль
changePassword.description: Your password is used to secure your wallet. You must use a strong password to protect your funds.

changePincode.title: Change PIN code
changePincode.description: Your PIN keeps your balance and transactions private

resyncAccounts.title: Повторна синхронізація акаунтів
resyncAccounts.description: Starts a background task to make sure your accounts are up to date.

hiddenAccounts.title: Hidden accounts
hiddenAccounts.description: Selecting this options will show accounts that were previously hidden.

deleteProfile.title: Delete profile
deleteProfile.description: Deletes your entire wallet, profile and transaction history. Make sure you have a backup.

deepLinks.title: Глибокі посилання
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Firefly upon clicking an iota:// link

developerMode.title: Режим розробника
developerMode.description: Connect to testnets and other developer features

nodeSettings.title: Налаштування Node
nodeSettings.description: Select Manual to configure the node settings and connect to your own node

configureNodeList.title: Select a node
configureNodeList.description: Manage the list of nodes your wallet connects to.
configureNodeList.noNodes: There are no nodes, automatic selection will be used instead.

proofOfWork.title: Proof of work
proofOfWork.description: Complete proof of work locally on your device or outsource to the node

errorLog.title: Звіт помилок
errorLog.description: View errors to debug an issue

stateExport.title: Експорт звіту
stateExport.description: Export your transaction history to a .csv file

troubleshoot.title: Виправлення помилок
troubleshoot.description: Use the troubleshooting wizard to solve common problems

documentation.title: Документація
documentation.description: View the documentation for in depth explanations of how things work

faq.title: Питання, що часто ставляться
faq.description: View the FAQs to get help with a common problem or question

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Get help from the IOTA community on Discord

reportAnIssue.title: Report an issue
reportAnIssue.description: Report a bug to the developers. Check through to make sure it hasn't already been reported.

login.pleaseWait: Будь ласка, зачекайте {time, plural, one {1 секунду} few {# секунди} many {# секунд} other {# секунд}}
login.incorrectAttempts: {attempts, plural, one {1 некоректна спроба} few {# некоректні спроби} many {# некоректних спроб} other {# некоректних спроб}}

strongholdBackup.title: Wallet Backup
strongholdBackup.weeksAgo: {weeks, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}} ago

password.title: Необхідний пароль
password.subtitle: Please enter your password to unlock Stronghold
password.backup: Please enter your password to export a backup

version.title: Current version: {version}
version.upToDateDescription: You are running the latest and safest version of Firefly.

backup.title: Last backup: {date}
backup.backupDescription: It is important to back up regularly to ensure you have a copy of your accounts and transaction history.
backup.backupWarning: If you lose your backup and recovery phrase you will lose access to your funds.
backup.notBackedUpDescription: You have not backed up your Stronghold

deleteAccount.title: Delete {name}?
deleteAccount.body: This account has no transaction history. It can safely be deleted.
deleteAccount.typePassword: Type your wallet password to confirm.
deleteAccount.errorBody1: You cannot delete this account, you must have at least one.

hideAccount.title: Hide {name}?
hideAccount.body: You can find this account later by enabling "Show hidden accounts" in Advanced Settings.
hideAccount.typePassword: Type your wallet password to confirm.
hideAccount.errorBody1: To hide an account it must have 0 balance.
hideAccount.errorBody2: You currently have {balance} remaining on this account. Please move these funds to a different account and try again.
hideAccount.errorBody3: You cannot hide this account, you must have at least one.

node.removeConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this node?

deleteProfile.title: Delete profile
deleteProfile.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This operation cannot be undone.

actions.iveWrittenRecoveryPhrase: Я записав свою фразу для відновлення

general.scanQrOrPaste: Скануйте QR код або вставте адресу
general.uploadSeedvaultOrStronghold: Імпортувати файл Stronghold або SeedVault file
general.noAccounts: You have no accounts, please create one.
general.accountRemoved: This account is hidden. Unhide it to perform transfers.

dates.daysAgo: {time, plural, one {# day} other {# days}} ago
dates.weeksAgo: {time, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}} ago
dates.monthsAgo: {time, plural, one {# month} other {# months}} ago
dates.yearsAgo: {time, plural, one {# year} other {# years}} ago

notifications.updateError: An error occurred during the update, please try again
notifications.minutesRemaining: {minutes, plural, one {1 minute remaining} other {# minutes remaining}}

profile.length: Your profile name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.
profile.duplicate: A profile with this name already exists.

password.tooWeak: Your new password is too weak.
password.row: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess.
password.pattern: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
password.names: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
password.repeats: Repeats like 'aaa' are easy to guess.
password.repeats2: Repeats like 'abcabcabc' are easy to guess.
password.sequence: Sequences of characters are easy to guess.
password.years: Recent years are easy to guess.
password.common: This is a very common password.
password.similar: This is similar to a common password.
password.word: A single word is easy to guess.
password.length: Your password can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.

pincode.length: Your PIN must be {length, plural, one {1 digit} other {# digits}} long.

account.length: Your account name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.
account.empty: You must use your latest account before creating a new one.
account.notEmpty: You must transfer your balance before deleting this account.
account.duplicate: An account with this name already exists.
account.tilde: A profile name can't start with the '~' character.
account.control: A profile name can't contain a control character.
account.startDot: A profile name can't start with the '.' character.
account.chars: A profile name can't contain the following characters <>:"/\|?*

send.addressLength: Addresses should be {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}} long.
send.amountTooHigh: This is greater than your available balance.
send.amountNoFloat: If units are `i` you cannot use decimal places.
send.amountInvalidFormat: The amount appears to be an invalid number.
send.amountZero: The amount must be greater than 0.
send.wrongAddressFormat: The address is not correctly formatted.
send.noToAccount: You have not selected an account to send the funds to.
send.sendingDust: You cannot send less than 1 Mi.
send.leavingDust: You cannot leave less than 1 Mi on your address.

node.https: HTTPS is required. Set up a developer profile to use unsecured HTTP connections.
node.duplicate: This node has already been added.
node.unsynced: The node is not in sync.

backup.invalid: The backup file was not recognised.
backup.destination: The backup destination was not valid.
backup.seedTooShort: The seed should be 81 characters long, it {length, plural, one {is 1} other {is #}}
backup.seedCharacters: The seed should only contain characters A-Z or 9
backup.phraseWordCount: There should be 24 words in your recovery phrase, currently there {length, plural, one {is 1} other {are #}}.
backup.phraseUnrecognizedWord: Unrecognized word "{word}" in your recovery phrase
backup.phraseCaseWord: The word "{word}" should be lower case
